name: Compass Man
description:
Compass Man

Since the day he found a strange compass and was struck by the lightning some strange force has been pulling him to the north. The situation became complicated when he suddenly got to the North Pole. He's now trapped there with no chance to escape. The only thing left.... is to survive!

Try to survive as long as you can. Collect hot stuff, keep your body temperature, avoid evil penguins and even more evil walruses. Do not let the power of compass defeat you!
